name: Ninja Monkey
inGameDesc: Stealthy and fast Monkey that throws bladed shurikens to pop the Bloons. Can target Camo Bloons.
target:
First, Last, Close, Strong,
Camo Priority
(Caltrops locked to Normal if purchased)

path1.name: Ninja Discipline
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Increases attack speed.
Effect: All attacks gain +61.2% attack speed (0.62x attack cooldown).

path1.name: Sharp Shurikens
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Shurikens can pop 4 Bloons each.
Effect: Doubles pierce of each shuriken, from 2 to 4.

path1.name: Double Shot
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Throws 2 shurikens at once.
Effect: Throws 2 shurikens per shot in a narrow spread.

path1.name: Bloonjitsu
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Throws 5 shurikens at once!
Effect: Now throws 5 shurikens per shot instead of 2.

path1.name: Grandmaster Ninja
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Throws incredibly fast, 8 shurikens per shot!
Effect: Throws 8 shurikens at once, with 2 damage and +222% faster (0.31x attack cooldown). Also gains +10 range.

path2.name: Distraction
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Some Bloons will become distracted and move backwards.
Effect: Shurikens gain a 15% chance to blowback bloons.

path2.name: Counter-Espionage
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Ninja attacks can strip camo from Bloons they damage.
Effect: Self-explanatory

path2.name: Shinobi Tactics
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Increases attack speed and pierce of nearby Ninjas. Stacks 20 times.
Effect: Increases attack speed of itself and other Ninjas in range by +8% multiplicatively and pierce by +8% additively. Stacks up to 20 times.

path2.name: Bloon Sabotage
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Sabotage ability: Lasts 15 seconds. During the sabotage, all Bloons move at half speed.
Effect: Ability slows down all bloons on screen and any incoming bloons by 50% for 15 seconds. Cannot soak through MOAB-class layers nor affect BADs and bosses.

path2.name: Grand Saboteur
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Ability duration is longer, and MOAB-Class Bloons spawn with less health during the sabotage. Buffs all Shinobi.
Effect: Ability lasts twice as long and MOAB-class bloons spawning from the entrance, BADs included, start with 25% less health. Ability also grants all Shinobis or above on screen +10 range and +2 damage to MOAB-class bloons.

path3.name: Seeking Shuriken
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Increased attack range and shurikens will seek out and pop Bloons automatically.
Effect: Shurikens will aggressively seek out bloons, regardless of where they are. Range increases by +7.

path3.name: Caltrops
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Throws out spiked caltrops onto the track nearby.
Effect: Regularly throws out caltrops onto nearby track. Pops up to 6 bloons per caltrop. Lasts for 1 round or 70 seconds, whichever comes first.

path3.name: Flash Bomb
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Throws a flash bomb that stuns multiple Bloons.
Effect: Every few shuriken throws, it throws a Flash Bomb that stuns bloons for 1.3 seconds and pops any bloon type including Leads and Blacks.

path3.name: Sticky Bomb
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Throws powerful timed charges at MOAB-Class Bloons.
Effect: Throws sticky bombs onto nearby MOAB-class bloons every few seconds. Sticky bombs detonate after 3.0s, dealing 500 damage to that blimp and 100 damage, 10 pierce, and 40 blast radius to bloons around it upon detonation. Range increases from 47 to 55.

path3.name: Master Bomber
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: One Monkey MOAB demolition machine.
Effect: Throws stronger sticky bombs over any distance that stun affected blimps and deal 3000 damage upon detonation instead of 500, damage of area explosion increases from 100 to 600. Flash bomb attack deals more damage and briefly stuns blimps too, while caltrops deal 5 damage instead of one and +5 more to ceramics.

paragon.name: Ascended Shadow
paragon.upgradeBody:
Description: The complete assassin package for dealing with any Bloon threat.
Effect: Shoots 8 massive, high-damaging seeking shurikens and 5 powerful flash bombs rapidly. Flash bombs additionally produce extra mini shurikens. Also deploys enhanced anti-MOAB sticky bombs over any distance which do extreme damage upon expiration. Adds a passive effect on all bloons on screen, slowing all Bloons (except for BADs and Bosses) on screen to half speed permanently, and decreasing outer layer HP of incoming non-Boss Bloons by 25%.
